= Bajos=

Welcome to the bajos wiki!

Bajos is a Java runtime environment for microcontrollers. It consists of BAJVM, a Java Virtual Machine and of BAJOSBOOT, a collection of system classes. BAJOS can be adapted to Embedded Systems with/without operating system and has been tested for 8 and 32 bit AVR controllers (atmega128,UC3A, AP7000). Java runs now at ArduinoBoardMega:http://arduino.cc/en/Main/ArduinoBoardMega with real time interrupts. 

check http://cs.ba-berlin.de/ for latest stable revision
